name: Stealthy VSTO Persistence
description: Detects persistence via Visual Studio Tools for Office (VSTO) add-ins in Office applications.
query: ((winlog.event_data.EventType:/[Ss][Ee][Tt][Vv][Aa][Ll][Uu][Ee]/ AND registry.path:(/.*\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee]\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee]\\[Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee]\\[Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Ll]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee]\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Pp][Oo][Ii][Nn][Tt]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Vv][Ss][Tt][Oo]\\[Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ii][Tt][Yy]\\[Ii][Nn][Cc][Ll][Uu][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\.*/)) AND (NOT ((process.executable:(/.*\\[Mm][Ss][Ii][Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Rr][Ee][Gg][Ss][Vv][Rr]32\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) OR (process.executable:(/.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Gg][Rr][Aa][Tt][Oo][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee][Cc][Ll][Ii][Cc][Kk][Tt][Oo][Rr][Uu][Nn]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) OR (process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\[Aa][Vv][Gg]\\[Aa][Nn][Tt][Ii][Vv][Ii][Rr][Uu][Ss]\\[Rr][Ee][Gg][Ss][Vv][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND registry.path:/.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee]\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Aa][Nn][Tt][Ii][Vv][Ii][Rr][Uu][Ss]\.[Aa][Ss][Oo][Uu][Tt][Ee][Xx][Tt]\\.*/))))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((winlog.event_data.EventType:SetValue AND registry.path:(*\\Software\\Microsoft\\Office\\Outlook\\Addins\\* OR *\\Software\\Microsoft\\Office\\Word\\Addins\\* OR *\\Software\\Microsoft\\Office\\Excel\\Addins\\* OR *\\Software\\Microsoft\\Office\\Powerpoint\\Addins\\* OR *\\Software\\Microsoft\\VSTO\\Security\\Inclusion\\*)) AND (NOT ((process.executable:(*\\msiexec.exe OR *\\regsvr32.exe)) OR (process.executable:(*\\winword.exe OR *\\integrator.exe OR *\\OfficeClickToRun.exe)) OR (process.executable:C\:\\Program\ Files\\AVG\\Antivirus\\RegSvr.exe AND registry.path:*\\Microsoft\\Office\\Outlook\\Addins\\Antivirus.AsOutExt\\*))))`
